verses.verse: <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H2204>old,<s%> and well <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>age.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H1288>blessed<s%> Abraham in all <S%H85>things.<s%>

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> the <S%H2205>elder<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> who ruled <S%H4910>over<s%> all that he <S%H7760>had,<s%> "Please put your <S%H3027>hand<s%> under my <S%H3409>thigh.<s%>

I will make you <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that you shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> whom I <S%H3427>live.<s%>
But you shall <S%H3212>go<s%> to my <S%H776>country,<s%> and to my <S%H4138>relatives,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>"

The <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H802>him,<s%> "What if the woman <S%H14>isn't<s%> willing to <S%H3212>follow<s%> <S%H310>me<s%> to this <S%H776>land?<s%> Must I <S%H7725>bring<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> you came <S%H3318>from?<s%>"
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8104>him,<s%> "Beware that you <S%H6435>don't<s%> <S%H7725>bring<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> there <S%H7725>again.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> who took <S%H3947>me<s%> from my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and from the <S%H776>land<s%> of my <S%H1696>birth,<s%> who spoke to <S%H7650>me,<s%> and who swore to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, <S%H5414><s%> 'I will give this <S%H776>land<s%> to your <S%H2233>seed.<s%>' He will <S%H7971>send<s%> his <S%H4397>angel<s%> before <S%H6440>you,<s%> and <S%H6440>you<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my son from <S%H1121>there.<s%>

If the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H14>isn't<s%> willing to <S%H3212>follow<s%> <S%H310>you,<s%> then you shall be <S%H5352>clear<s%> from this my <S%H7621>oath.<s%> Only you shall not <S%H7725>bring<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> there <S%H7725>again.<s%>"

The <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> under the <S%H3409>thigh<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H113>master,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore<s%> to him <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>matter.<s%>

The <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1581>camels,<s%> of his <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and <S%H3212>departed,<s%> having a variety of good <S%H2898>things<s%> of his <S%H113>master<s%>'s with <S%H3027>him.<s%> He <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H763>Mesopotamia,<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor.<s%>

He <S%H1288>made<s%> the <S%H1581>camels<s%> kneel <S%H1288>down<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H413>by<s%> the <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6153>evening,<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> that women go <S%H3318>out<s%> to draw <S%H7579>water.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> please give <S%H6440>me<s%> <S%H7136>success<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H5973>to<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham.<s%>

<S%H5324>Behold,<s%> I am standing by the <S%H5869>spring<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%> The <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> are coming <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

Let it <S%H5291>happen,<s%> that the young lady to whom I will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5186><s%> 'Please let down your <S%H3537>pitcher,<s%> that I may <S%H8354>drink,<s%>' and she will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8354><s%> 'Drink, and I will also <S%H8248>give<s%> your <S%H1581>camels<s%> a <S%H8248>drink,<s%>'—let her be the one you have <S%H3198>appointed<s%> for your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%> By this I will <S%H3045>know<s%> that you have <S%H6213>shown<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to my <S%H113>master.<s%>"

It <S%H3615>happened,<s%> before he had finished <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> that <S%H7259>behold,<s%> Rebekah came <S%H3318>out,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H251>brother,<s%> with her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> on her <S%H7926>shoulder.<s%>

The young <S%H5291>lady<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>beautiful<s%> to look <S%H4758>at,<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> neither had any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3381>her.<s%> She went down to the <S%H5869>spring,<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher,<s%> and came <S%H5927>up.<s%>

The <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> to meet <S%H7125>her,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Please give me a <S%H1572>drink,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from your <S%H3537>pitcher.<s%>"

She <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8354>"Drink,<s%> my <S%H113>lord.<s%>" She <S%H4116>hurried,<s%> and let <S%H3381>down<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> on her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and gave him <S%H8248>drink.<s%>

When she had <S%H3615>done<s%> giving him <S%H8248>drink,<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will also <S%H7579>draw<s%> for your <S%H1581>camels,<s%> until they have <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H8354>drinking.<s%>"

She <S%H4116>hurried,<s%> and <S%H6168>emptied<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> into the <S%H8268>trough,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> again to the <S%H875>well<s%> to <S%H7579>draw,<s%> and <S%H7579>drew<s%> for all his <S%H1581>camels.<s%>

The <S%H376>man<s%> looked <S%H7583>steadfastly<s%> at <S%H2790>her,<s%> remaining silent, to <S%H3045>know<s%> whether <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6743>made<s%> his <S%H1870>journey<s%> <S%H6743>prosperous<s%> or <S%H518>not.<s%>

It <S%H1581>happened,<s%> as the camels had <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H8354>drinking,<s%> that the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>ring<s%> of half a <S%H1235>shekel<s%> <S%H4948>weight,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> for her <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> shekels <S%H4948>weight<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%>

and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Whose<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> are <S%H859>you?<s%> Please <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H3426>me.<s%> Is there <S%H4725>room<s%> in your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> for us to lodge <S%H3885>in?<s%>"
She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1323>him,<s%> "I am the daughter of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> whom she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H5152>Nahor.<s%>"
She <S%H559>said<s%> moreover to <S%H1571>him,<s%> "We have both <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>provender<s%> <S%H7227>enough,<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H4725>room<s%> to lodge <S%H3885>in.<s%>"
The <S%H376>man<s%> bowed his <S%H6915>head,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> who has not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and his <S%H571>truth<s%> toward my <S%H113>master.<s%> As for <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh has led <S%H5148>me<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H251>relatives.<s%>"
The young <S%H5291>lady<s%> <S%H7323>ran,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> her <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> about these <S%H1697>words.<s%>

<S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> had a <S%H251>brother,<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3837>Laban.<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> to the <S%H376>man,<s%> to the <S%H5869>spring.<s%>

It <S%H7200>happened,<s%> when he saw the <S%H5141>ring,<s%> and the <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> on his <S%H269>sister<s%>'s <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H269>sister,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>"This<s%> is what the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H935>me,<s%>" that he came to the <S%H376>man.<s%> <S%H5975>Behold,<s%> he was standing <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1581>camels<s%> at the <S%H5869>spring.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Come <S%H935>in,<s%> you <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Why do you <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H2351>outside?<s%> For I have <S%H6437>prepared<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4725>room<s%> for the <S%H1581>camels.<s%>"

The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and he <S%H6605>unloaded<s%> the <S%H1581>camels.<s%> He <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>provender<s%> for the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> and the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the men who were with <S%H582>him.<s%>

Food was <S%H7760>set<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%> to <S%H398>eat,<s%> but he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will not <S%H398>eat<s%> until I have <S%H1696>told<s%> my <S%H1697>message.<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Speak <S%H1696>on.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%> He has become <S%H1431>great.<s%> He has <S%H5414>given<s%> him <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H1241>herds,<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> male <S%H5650>servants<s%> and female <S%H8198>servants,<s%> and <S%H1581>camels<s%> and <S%H2543>donkeys.<s%>

<S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> to my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H310>when<s%> she was <S%H2209>old.<s%> He has given all that he has to <S%H5414>him.<s%>

My <S%H113>master<s%> made me <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947><s%> 'You shall not take a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> in whose <S%H776>land<s%> I <S%H3427>live,<s%>
<S%H518>but<s%> you shall <S%H3212>go<s%> to my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and to my <S%H4940>relatives,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son.<s%>'
I <S%H559>asked<s%> my <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H802><s%> 'What if the woman will not follow <S%H3212>me?<s%>'

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>me,<s%> 'Yahweh, <S%H6440>before<s%> whom I <S%H1980>walk,<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> his <S%H4397>angel<s%> with <S%H6743>you,<s%> and prosper your <S%H1870>way.<s%> You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%> of my <S%H4940>relatives,<s%> and of my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Then will you be <S%H5352>clear<s%> from my <S%H423>oath,<s%> when you <S%H935>come<s%> to my <S%H4940>relatives.<s%> If they <S%H5414>don't<s%> give her to <S%H5355>you,<s%> you shall be clear from my <S%H423>oath.<s%>'

I <S%H935>came<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> to the <S%H5869>spring,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> if now you <S%H3426>do<s%> <S%H6743>prosper<s%> my <S%H1870>way<s%> which I <S%H1980>go<s%>—

<S%H5324>behold,<s%> I am standing by this <S%H5869>spring<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%> Let it <S%H5959>happen,<s%> that the maiden who comes <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7579>draw,<s%> to whom I will <S%H559>say,<s%> "Please give <S%H8248>me<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from your <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> to <S%H8248>drink,<s%>"

and she will tell <S%H8354>me,<s%> "Drink, and I will also <S%H7579>draw<s%> for your <S%H1581>camels,<s%>"—let her be the <S%H802>woman<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has appointed for my <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1121>son.<s%>'

Before I had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H7259>behold,<s%> Rebekah came <S%H3318>out<s%> with her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> on her <S%H7926>shoulder.<s%> She went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H5869>spring,<s%> and <S%H7579>drew.<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8248>her,<s%> 'Please let me drink.'

She <S%H4116>hurried<s%> and let <S%H3381>down<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> from her <S%H559>shoulder,<s%> and said, <S%H8354><s%> 'Drink, and I will also <S%H8248>give<s%> your <S%H1581>camels<s%> a <S%H8248>drink.<s%>' So I <S%H8354>drank,<s%> and she also <S%H8248>gave<s%> the <S%H1581>camels<s%> a <S%H8248>drink.<s%>

I <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H559>her,<s%> and said, <S%H1323><s%> 'Whose daughter are <S%H559>you?<s%>' She said, <S%H1323><s%> 'The daughter of <S%H1328>Bethuel,<s%> <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> whom <S%H4435>Milcah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H7760>him.<s%>' I put the <S%H5141>ring<s%> on her <S%H639>nose,<s%> and the <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> on her <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

I bowed my <S%H6915>head,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> who had led <S%H5148>me<s%> in the <S%H571>right<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> for his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Now if you <S%H3426>will<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> and <S%H571>truly<s%> with my <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H5046>me.<s%> If not, tell <S%H6437>me,<s%> that I may turn to the right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to the <S%H8040>left.<s%>"

Then <S%H3837>Laban<s%> and <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>"The<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3318>proceeds<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> We <S%H3201>can't<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you <S%H7451>bad<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>

<S%H7259>Behold,<s%> Rebekah is before <S%H6440>you.<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H3212>her,<s%> and go, and let her be your <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>"
It happened that when <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H1697>words,<s%> he <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself down to the <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H5650>servant<s%> brought <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H899>clothing,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to <S%H7259>Rebekah.<s%> He also <S%H5414>gave<s%> precious <S%H4030>things<s%> to her <S%H251>brother<s%> and her <S%H517>mother.<s%>

They <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank,<s%> he and the <S%H582>men<s%> who were with <S%H3885>him,<s%> and stayed all night. They rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Send me <S%H7971>away<s%> to my <S%H113>master.<s%>"
